entry.title: Smart Men's Waterproof Sports Watch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Track-Your-Beats
Type: Smart Watch
Price: 6.78 - 32.18 (28 variants)

Overview:
USB Quick Removal Direct Charge
Brand new bracelet charging method, quick-release detachable wristband design, can be charged by plugging in the USB interface, eliminating the trouble of carrying a charging cable and charging stand.
Smart Life Assistant
The watch can monitor the steps, calories, heart rate, distance, sleep quality, etc. Of the day. At the same time, it can connected to a smart phone to view information, remotely take pictures, retrieve mobile phones and other thoughtful and convenient functions to make your life more convenient.
Practical
Keep abreast of your exercise intensity and physical condition in order to adjust your fitness plan in a timely manner.
Multiple sports modes
The phone has a variety of sports modes built-in, no need to add on the phone, wear the bracelet directly to exercise, the bracelet can record all your sports data.
Skin-friendly material
The bracelet wristband is made of lightweight skin-friendly soft TPU, which adopts a lightweight design.
Heart rate monitoring
Equipped with wrist optical heart rate sensor, enter the heart rate test interface for a few seconds, display current heart rate measurement results.


Specifications:
Type: Smart Watch
Quantity: 1PC
Material: TPU
Color: Black/Pink
Battery capacity: 150 mAh
Screen size: 4.15*3.63cm/1.63* 1.43 inch Screen
Packing Size: 12.2*8.1*3.2cm/4.79*3.18*1.26inch
Net Weight: 45.0g/1.59oz

Scan the following QR code and download "Heyband"
APP Languages: Simplified Chinese, traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, German, Italian, French, Greek, Turkish, Russian, Dutch, Portuguese

Features:
- Sports record: Steps, sports time, distance, calories, sleep monitor, sport and sleep data in 30 days are saved. 
- Health Monitor: Real-time heart rate measurement(Static, dynamic), Blood pressure(Timed blood pressure measurement can be set), Blood oxygen monitor, Fatigue monitor.
- Reminders: Alarm,Drink reminder,sedentary reminder,call reminder,Notification(SMS/QQ/Wechat/Skype/Facebook/Twitter/Line/WhatsApp),Anti-lost. 
- Others: Raise to wake, One Key Examination, Time, remote camera, DND mode, find the band, WeChat movement, reject a call on the smart band, OTA.

Package included:
1 x Smart Band
1 x Charging Cable
1 x User Manual

Touch Display Screen: 1.3 inch TFT round HD
Touch Screen: Single touch OGS Capacitive Screen
Resolution: 240*240 pixel
CPU: HS6620D
Memory: 128Mb RAM 256Mb ROM
Sensors: heart rate sensor
Battery: 140mAh High voltage Polymer battery
Charging Time: about 2-3 hours
Standby Time: about 8 days
Normal Use: about 3 days
Charging: USB Charger Dock
G-sensor: support
Vibration Reminding: yes
OTA Upgrade: yes
APP / APK Download: Scan the QR code on your watch through phone browser to download and install App.
Finish Processing: Plastic case + Interchangeable TPU strap
Support Languages: Chinese, English, Portuguese, Japanese, French, Spanish, Russian, etc. (The above 7 languages can be displayed in the app after syncing with the phone).
 
Features:
- Super conducting powder metallurgy electrode materials, screening of 32 electrocardiogram diseases.
- Blood Pressure and Blood Oxygen Monitor, Sedentary reminder, Multiple sport modes.
- 24 hours Heart Rate Monitor: By the green optical sensor, Analyze blood flow under the skin and improper heart rate in real time, Avoid excessive heart rate caused by unproper exercise.
- Sleep Monitor: Enter in a monitoring for sleep interface and click start and then put onto hand to sleep,the pedometer will monitor user's sleep quality through Oscillation Amplitude and duration of sleep.
- Waterproof standard design of IP67 three-proofing machine, advanced electrode touch 2-in-1 technology.
- Intelligent mute vibration reminder, USB plug-in type convenient charging.
- SMS: bluetooth Push Notifications. Leave your phone in your pocket and view notifications on your wrist.
- Other functions:Remote camera,Music Control,Loss-proof reminder,Alarm clock ,reminder Task reminder,activity reminder,sedentary reminder, etc.

entry.title: Waterproof Sports Smartwatch For Android / IOS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Track-Your-Beats
Type: Smart Watch
Price: 25.93

Main features:
• Heart rate monitor: HRM heart rate monitor function will give you the real-time feedback, let you know about your heart rate anytime and anywhere
• Sleep monitor: it monitors your sleep quality through measurement of duration for deep sleep, non-REM sleep and waking condition
• Sedentary and drinking remind: when you are sitting for a longer time than the preset duration, the watch would remind you with vibration or a ring that it's time for exercise and drinking
• Alarm remind: setting the alarm clock on the phone, the watch will remind you with vibration
• Remote camera: control your smartphone to take phones on your wrist
• Call/message remind: when a call or message is coming, the bracelet will light and vibrate to remind you
• Anti-lost: when it's synchronized with your phone, the watch gives an alarm by vibration or ring when the phone is more than 10m away from the smartwatch

 

Bluetooth Version: Bluetooth 4.0
Built-in chip type: Nordic 52832
RAM: 64K
ROM: 512K
Waterproof: Yes
Alert type: Vibration
Anti-lost: Yes
Bluetooth calling: Answering,Phone call reminder,Caller's name display,Reject answer the phone

Other Function: Bluetooth,Alarm,Waterproof,Barometer

Features:
1.Stylish & 0.96 inches TFT Color Screen Design: Fitness tracker with color screen,you can see the screen clearly in the sun or in the dark.Cool design and double-color Strap suitable for everyone.
2. Heart Rate & Sleep Monitor: Check your heart rate automatically to help you do exercise scientifically. Sleep Monitor automatically tracks your sleep duration and sleep quality.
3. Notification Remind: intelligent notification be clear at a glance, convenient and timely access to a telephone, SMS, and all kinds of social information. You will never miss a call or message. Sedentary reminder, remind you to leave the seat for just the right amount of exercise.
4. Unique Design: Featuring a sleek, modern look, versatility, broad compatibility, lightweight, adjustable wrist strap. It can be used as fitness tracker, health tracker.
5. IP67 Waterproof: You can wear it when washing hands,taking bath and swimming but not more than 3 meter deep.
6. Wide Compatibility: Supports bluetooth 4.1, compatible IOS8.0 and Android4.2 or above systems. 
 
Package Included:
1x Smart Bracelet
1x Charging Cable
1x User Manual

Features:
- Here comes the Smart Bracelet!

- To live a healthy life, buy it for yourself, your parents, and friends! It's our pleasure to help you live a funny and healthy life.
